Class Teleporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Cell
      • Teleporter

  • public class Teleporter
extends Cell
    Characters will be teleported when they move onto a teleporter tile. The arrival location should be one tile further past the teleporter's pair based on the direction the character moved onto the teleporter. The Teleporter class is a subclass of the Cell class.
    Creation Date: 20/11/19.
    Last Modification Date: 4/12/19.
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Timothy Roger (977422), Nihal Goindi (976005)

                    Teleporter teleMatch)

        teleMatch - Teleporter - the reference to it's pair.

      • doAction

        public void doAction(Character c)
        Characters will be teleported just past this teleporter's pair if they move onto the tile.
        Overrides:
        doAction in class Cell
        Parameters:
        c - Character - The Character instance is passed to the method in order to use it's information.

      • getCoords

        public int[] getCoords()
        Returns the teleporter instances' coordinates on the map.
        Returns:
        the small array of int values corresponding to the x and y coordinates.

      • getPairCoords

        public int[] getPairCoords()
        Returns the teleporter's pair's coordinates on the map.
        Returns:
        the array of int values corresponding to the x and y coordinates of this teleporter's pair.
